meanings.definition: A fermented milk drink similar to yogurt.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy drinking kefirs for breakfast every morning.
meanings.sent2: The store had a variety of kefirs on sale.
meanings.sent3: The kefirs in the fridge were having a party with the yogurts.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as refreshing as a glass of kefirs on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The kefirs bubbled with probiotic goodness, ready to be enjoyed.
